contentrichtext.text: {{orphan|date=December 2007}} {{third-party sources|date=December 2010}} '''''Zeit Wissen''''' is a bi-monthly [[magazine]] spun off from, and published by, the German newspaper ''[[Die Zeit]]''. Zeit Wissen frequently is compared to the American publication ''[[Wired magazine|Wired]]'', in that it covers the "cutting edge" of such diverse topics as technology, science, history, fashion, modern lifestyles, avant-garde art, photography, health, and even food. The German phrase "Zeit Wissen" literally translates to "Time-Knowledge," and refers to the up-to-the-minute nature of the magazine's subject matter and focus. ==External links== * [http://www.zeit.de/wissen ''Zeit Wissen'' website (German)] [[Category:Newspapers published in Germany|Zeit]] [[Category:Erasmus Prize winners]] [[Category:German-language magazines|Zeit Wissen]] [[Category:Monthly magazines|Zeit Wissen]] {{sci-mag-stub}}
